1101000101011000 1011000100101011 0 -> sum: 1000001010000011, cout: 1
1010000101110101 0100100101010001 1 -> sum: 1110101011000111, cout: 0
1100001010110111 0111011010000110 1 -> sum: 0011100100111110, cout: 1
